  <el-card>
    <RecordFilter ref="recordFilterRef" @search="reSearch" />
    <RecordTable
      ref="tableRef"
      :tableData="tableData"
      @changePage="search(formData)"
      @changePageSize="search(formData)"
    />
  </el-card>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage.error(`查询失败，原因是${error.message}`);
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage.error(`查询失败，原因是${error.message}`);
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

<script setup lang="ts">
/** 报价行情表格 */
import { GlobalEventBus } from '@/globalEventBus';
import { useMainGridStore } from '@/store';
import { UpdatePolicy, useRTD } from '@/utils/RealTimeData';
import { useLoading } from '@/utils/hooks/useLoading';
import { Spin } from 'thsc-design-vue';
import { Panel, StkTable } from 'thsc-ifind-bond-components';
import { onBeforeUnmount, onMounted, ref, shallowRef } from 'vue';
import { getLatestQuote } from './request';
import { quoteTableColumns } from './table-columns';
import { TagEnum } from './types/enum';
import { QuoteTableData } from './types/model';

const mainGridState = useMainGridStore();

const stkTable = ref<InstanceType<typeof StkTable>>();

const loading = useLoading(false);

const dataSource = shallowRef<QuoteTableData[]>([]);
initDataSource();

onMounted(() => {
  GlobalEventBus.addEventListener(GlobalEventBus.EventName.MainGridCurrentRowChange, initData);
});

onBeforeUnmount(() => {
  GlobalEventBus.removeEventListener(GlobalEventBus.EventName.MainGridCurrentRowChange, initData);
});

const { fetchData } = useRTD<QuoteTableData>({
  cfg: {
    removeLifecycleHooks: true,
  },
  pollingCfg: {
    interval: 5000,
    delay: Math.random() * 2000,
  },
  rtdCfg: {
    listenerId: 'handicapTableListener',
    point: 'bond_f5_broker_market_latest_quote',
  },
  // 过滤当前代码的数据
  dataFilter: data => data.thsCode === mainGridState.currentThsCode && window.validAuthSource.includes(data.tag),
  getDataFunc: getTableData,
  dataCallback(type, newData, tempPushData) {
    if (type === UpdatePolicy.Init) {
      updateDataSource(newData.concat(tempPushData), false);
    } else {
      // 增量
      updateDataSource(newData);
    }
  },
});

function initData() {
  initDataSource();
  fetchData();
}

};

const closeStockTag = (tag: StockTag) => {
  tags.value.splice(tags.value.indexOf(tag), 1);
};

/**
 * 分发操作前置校验
 */
const validateDistribution = () => {
  if (!tags.value?.length) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'warning',
      message: '请先选择要分发到的具体场景',
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
    return false;
  }
  return true;
};

const loading = ref(false);
/**
 * 确认新增分发
 */
const submitAdd = async () => {
  if (!validateDistribution()) {
    return;
  }
  loading.value = true;
  try {
    await distributionStore.distributeContent({
      contentIds: distributionStore.contentSelectedList,
      contentScenes: tags.value,
      sceneType: OPERATE_TYPE.DISCUSS_FEED,
      action: ACTION.ADD,
    });
    closeDialog();
    distributionStore.refreshTable = true;
    ElMessage({
      type: 'success',
      message: '分发成功',
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
    distributionStore.refreshTable = false;
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `操作失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    loading.value = false;
  }
};

defineExpose({
  openDistributeDialog,
});

      let inputEl = this.$el.querySelector('input')

      this.searchFocus = true

<template>
  <el-card>
    <RecordFilter ref="recordFilterRef" @search="reSearch" />
    <RecordTable
      ref="tableRef"
      :tableData="tableData"
      @changePage="search(formData)"

<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { MESSAGE_OFFSET } from '@/store/constant';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,

    });
  } finally {

import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { MESSAGE_OFFSET } from '@/store/constant';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

const delWearMedal = (index: number): void => {
  // 将勋章添加到可佩戴
  wearMedalArray.value.push(wearedMedalArray.value[index]);
  // 删除已佩戴的勋章
  wearedMedalArray.value.splice(index, 1);
};

/**
 * 添加佩戴的勋章
 * @param {number} index - 勋章索引
 */
const addWearMedal = (index: number): void => {
  // 最多佩戴1枚勋章
  if (!wearedMedalArray.value.length) {
    // 将勋章添加到已佩戴
    wearedMedalArray.value.push(wearMedalArray.value[index]);
    // 删除可佩戴的勋章
    wearMedalArray.value.splice(index, 1);
  } else {
    Toast('最多佩戴1枚勋章');
  }
};

<template>
  <el-card>
    <RecordFilter ref="recordFilterRef" @search="reSearch" />
    <RecordTable
      ref="tableRef"
      :tableData="tableData"
      @changePage="search(formData)"
      @changePageSize="search(formData)"
    />
  </el-card>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { MESSAGE_OFFSET } from '@/store/constant';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

 * 拖拽开始
 */
const handleDragStart = (): void => {
  if (wearedMedalArray.value.length) {
    disabled.value = true;
    Toast('最多佩戴1枚勋章');
  } else {
    disabled.value = false;
  }
};

/**
 * 拖拽结束
 */
const handleDragEnd = (): void => {
  disabled.value = false;
};

/**
 * 删除佩戴的勋章
 * @param {number} index - 勋章索引
 */
const delWearMedal = (index: number): void => {
  // 将勋章添加到可佩戴
  wearMedalArray.value.push(wearedMedalArray.value[index]);
  // 删除已佩戴的勋章
  wearedMedalArray.value.splice(index, 1);
};

/**
 * 添加佩戴的勋章
 * @param {number} index - 勋章索引
 */
const addWearMedal = (index: number): void => {
  // 最多佩戴1枚勋章
  if (!wearedMedalArray.value.length) {
    // 将勋章添加到已佩戴
    wearedMedalArray.value.push(wearMedalArray.value[index]);
    // 删除可佩戴的勋章
    wearMedalArray.value.splice(index, 1);
  } else {
    Toast('最多佩戴1枚勋章');
  }
};
</script>

      title: content || props.newsTitle,
      url: `${getShareUrl()}${props.id}/`,
      pageId: `${statConfig.page}`,
      urlImg: props.newsCoverImage,
    }, true);
  }, delay);
}

async function onShare() {
  onShareCb();
}

async function handleBack() {
  clickStat(statConfig.back, {
    news: props.newsTitle,
    newsId: props.newsId,
    type: props.type
  });
  // 触发当前停留时长埋点

  if (await getShowPushDialog()) {
    pushDialog()
    return
  }

    goBack()
    return
  }
  //当url上存在isAppLaunch=1时,需要劫持当前的返回事件,并根据当前文章类型进行跳转
  
}

      url: `${getShareUrl()}${props.id}/`,
      pageId: `${statConfig.page}`,
      urlImg: props.newsCoverImage,

}

    // 获取导航栏透明度
    const navigationOpacity = getComputedStyle(document.getElementsByClassName('navigation_background')[0] as HTMLElement).opacity;
    // 滚动距离大于导航栏高度且导航栏透明度为1时，不再改变透明度
    if (scrollTop > navigationHeight.value && navigationOpacity === '1') {
      return;
    }
    // 设置导航栏透明度
    (document.getElementsByClassName('navigation_background')[0] as HTMLElement).style.opacity = `${scrollTop / navigationHeight.value}`;
  });
});

 */

  Application.goBack();
};

<script setup lang="ts">
import { useMonitorMemberStore } from '@/store';
import { useLoading } from '@/utils/hooks/useLoading';
import dayjs from 'dayjs';
import { Button, DatePicker, Modal, RangePicker, Select, Spin } from 'thsc-design-vue';
import { Utils } from 'thsc-ifind-bond-components';
import { computed, onBeforeMount, onMounted, ref, watch } from 'vue';
import { useI18n } from 'vue-i18n';
import { TimeOption } from './enums';
import { apiList } from '@/http/apiList';

const pdfPreviewPageUrl = __DEV__ ? '/monitoringReport.html' : '?limit=5';

const iframeSrc = ref(pdfPreviewPageUrl);

const { t } = useI18n();

const formatOptions = [
  { label: t('导出为', ['Excel']), value: 'xlsx' },
  { label: t('导出为', ['PDF']), value: 'pdf' },
];

const monitorMemberStore = useMonitorMemberStore();
/** 监控成员选项 */
const monitorMemberOptions = computed(() => {
  return monitorMemberStore.memberList.map(it => ({ label: it.name, value: it.id }));
});

const iframeRef = ref<HTMLIFrameElement | null>(null);

const iframeLoading = useLoading(false);

const visible = ref(false);

const params = ref({
  /** 格式 */
  format: 'xlsx',
  /**监控成员 */
  member: '',
  /** 时间选择 */
  timeSelect: TimeOption.Day,
  date: dayjs(window.curDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD'),
  dateRange: [dayjs(window.curDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD'), dayjs(window.curDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')],
});

// 监控时间选择
watch(
  () => [params.value.date, params.value.timeSelect],
  () => {
    if (params.value.timeSelect === TimeOption.Day) {

];

const monitorMemberStore = useMonitorMemberStore();
/** 监控成员选项 */

      // 关闭后，一段时间后，回收iframe页面内存
      window.clearTimeout(clearIFrameTimeout);
      clearIFrameTimeout = window.setTimeout(() => {
        iframeSrc.value = 'about:blank';
      }, clearIFrameDelay);

    }

);

});

});

function iframeLoad() {
  iframeLoading.value = false;

  visible.value = true;

function handleCancel() {
  visible.value = false;

  value: IDataSourceConfigForDisplay;

const initialValue = computed((): IDataSourceConfigForDisplay => {
  return cloneDeep(props.value);
});

const cascaderOptions = ref(parameterFreeDataSourceCascaderData.value);

      dataSourceId: String(source.id),
      dataSourceName: source.name,
      fieldMappings: list,
    };
    initialValue.value.data = obj;
    emits('input', cloneDeep(initialValue.value));
  }
};

<script setup lang="ts">
import { reactive, toRefs } from 'vue';
import { IS_DEV } from '@/config/env';
import { checkIsInApp, goBackApp, jumpWebPage } from '@overseafront/utils';
import useOnShowFlag, { FLAG_TYPE } from '@/hooks/useOnShowFlag';
import { PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_PATH } from '@/config/constant';
import { startToBackwash } from '@/utils/localUtils';
import useAssets from '@/hooks/useAssets';

const { useAssetsImg } = useAssets();

const IconBack = useAssetsImg('icon_back');
const IconShare = useAssetsImg('icon_share');

const emits = defineEmits(['shareOpenCb', 'shareCloseCb']);

const state = reactive({
  // 标题栏是否显示，分享时使用
  show: true,
});

// 点击返回
const clickToReturn = () => {
  if (IS_DEV) {
    // back
  } else {
    if (!checkIsInApp()) {
      // 触发回流
      startToBackwash();
      return;
    }
    // type为component表示退出当前webview；type为webpage表示返回当前容器上一级堆栈，若无上一级堆栈则退出容器；
    goBackApp('webpage');
  }
};

// onshow的flag
const { setFlag } = useOnShowFlag();

// 点击跳转产品说明
function clickQuestionInfo() {
  // 埋点
  // window.statConf.click(HOME_STAT.FAQ, { goodsId: props.sid });
  if (!checkIsInApp()) {
    // 触发回流
    startToBackwash();
    return;
  }
  // 记录onshow的flag
  setFlag(FLAG_TYPE.JUMP_NEXT_PAGE);
  jumpWebPage({
    url: `${PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_PATH.CURRENT_PRODUCT_LIST}?sid=${props.sid}`,
    noNavBar: true,
    noStatusBar: false,
  });
}


function clickToShare() {
  if (!checkIsInApp()) {
    // 触发回流
    startToBackwash();
    return;
  }
  emits.shareOpenCb();
}

import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { themeVars } from '@/config/themeVar';
import {
  callNativeDetainNotify,
  getStatusBarHeight,
  registerNativeDetainNotify,
} from '@/utils/clientInterface';
import WebTitleBar from '@/components/WebTitleBar/index.vue';
import { useMainStore } from '@/store';
import { checkIsInApp, toast } from '@overseafront/utils';
import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';
import { onShowCbProxy } from '@/utils/cbProxy';
import useOnShowFlag, { FLAG_TYPE } from './hooks/useOnShowFlag';
import { QUERY_STATE } from './config/interface';
import { initBackwash } from '@/utils/localUtils';
import useProductListOfSubscription from './hooks/useProductListOfSubscription';

const isInApp = checkIsInApp();

const mainStore = useMainStore();

const { showLoading } = storeToRefs(mainStore);

// 记录css变量
const saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight = (height: number) => {
  const appNode = document.querySelector('body');
  // @ts-ignore
  appNode && appNode.style.setProperty('--status-bar-height', `${height}px`);
};

// 获取状态栏高度
const getCurrStatusBarHeight = async () => {
  try {
    // @ts-ignore
    const { data } = await getStatusBarHeight();
    window.console.log('001', data);
    const statusBarHeight = data.statusBarHeight * window.rem.dpr;
    // 记录css变量
    saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight(statusBarHeight);
  } catch (error) {
    window.console.error(error);
  }
};

const { getFlag } = useOnShowFlag();

const { queryData, queryState } = useProductListOfSubscription();

// 监听onshow - 跳转后回转
function onShowOfJumpBack() {
  onShowCbProxy.on('onShow_redeem_coupon_back', () => {
    window.console.log('onshow');
    // 判断当前进入下一页
    const isBack = getFlag(FLAG_TYPE.JUMP_NEXT_PAGE);
    if (isBack) {
      window.console.log('onshow isBack', isBack);
    }
  });
}

import { onMounted, reactive, toRefs } from 'vue';
import { IS_DEV } from '@/config/env';
import { checkIsInApp, goBackApp } from '@overseafront/utils';
import { startToBackwash } from '@/utils/localUtils';
import useAssets from '@/hooks/useAssets';
import { ShareParamsType, handleShare, registerNativeShare } from '@/utils/clientInterface';

const { useAssetsImg } = useAssets();

const IconBack = useAssetsImg('icon_back');
const IconShare = useAssetsImg('icon_share');

const emits = defineEmits(['toggleShareOperating']);

const state = reactive({
  // 标题栏是否显示，分享时使用
  showTitleBar: true,
});

// 点击返回
const clickToReturn = () => {
  if (IS_DEV) {
    // back
  } else {
    if (!checkIsInApp()) {
      // 触发回流
      startToBackwash();
      return;
    }
    // type为component表示退出当前webview；type为webpage表示返回当前容器上一级堆栈，若无上一级堆栈则退出容器；
    goBackApp('webpage');
  }
};

function clickToShare() {
  if (!checkIsInApp()) {
    // 触发回流
    startToBackwash();
    return;
  }
  // 分享操作开始
  showTitleBar.value = false;
  // 分享参数
  const params: ShareParamsType = {
    title: 'Receive Coupons',
    url: window.location.href,
    // 曝光埋点
    pageId: '',
    shareLocation: 'body',
  };
  // 此处无法使用nextTick，因无法获知父组件（且安卓的nextTick有问题）
  const delay = 300;
  setTimeout(() => {
    handleShare(params);
  }, delay);
}

<script setup lang="ts" name="App">
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { themeVars } from '@/config/themeVar';
import {
  callNativeDetainNotify,
  getStatusBarHeight,
  registerNativeDetainNotify,
} from '@/utils/clientInterface';
import WebTitleBar from '@/components/WebTitleBar/index.vue';
import { useMainStore } from '@/store';
import { checkIsInApp, toast } from '@overseafront/utils';
import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';
import { onShowCbProxy } from '@/utils/cbProxy';
import useOnShowFlag, { FLAG_TYPE } from './hooks/useOnShowFlag';
import { QUERY_STATE } from './config/interface';
import { initBackwash } from '@/utils/localUtils';
import useProductListOfSubscription from './hooks/useProductListOfSubscription';

const isInApp = checkIsInApp();

const mainStore = useMainStore();

const { showLoading } = storeToRefs(mainStore);

// 记录css变量
const saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight = (height: number) => {
  const appNode = document.querySelector('body');
  // @ts-ignore
  appNode && appNode.style.setProperty('--status-bar-height', `${height}px`);
};

// 获取状态栏高度
const getCurrStatusBarHeight = async () => {
  try {
    // @ts-ignore
    const { data } = await getStatusBarHeight();
    window.console.log('001', data);
    const statusBarHeight = data.statusBarHeight * window.rem.dpr;
    // 记录css变量
    saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight(statusBarHeight);
  } catch (error) {
    window.console.error(error);
  }
};

const { getFlag } = useOnShowFlag();

const { queryData, queryState } = useProductListOfSubscription();

// 监听onshow - 跳转后回转
function onShowOfJumpBack() {
  onShowCbProxy.on('onShow_redeem_coupon_back', () => {
    window.console.log('onshow');
    // 判断当前进入下一页
    const isBack = getFlag(FLAG_TYPE.JUMP_NEXT_PAGE);
    if (isBack) {
      window.console.log('onshow isBack', isBack);
    }
  });
}

];

import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';

} from '@/utils/clientInterface';

const isInApp = checkIsInApp();

// 记录css变量
const saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight = (height: number) => {
  const appNode = document.querySelector('body');
  // @ts-ignore
  appNode && appNode.style.setProperty('--status-bar-height', `${height}px`);
};

// 获取状态栏高度
const getCurrStatusBarHeight = async () => {
  try {
    // @ts-ignore
    const { data } = await getStatusBarHeight();
    window.console.log('001', data);
    const statusBarHeight = data.statusBarHeight * window.rem.dpr;
    // 记录css变量
    saveCssVarOfStatusBarHeight(statusBarHeight);
  } catch (error) {
    window.console.error(error);
  }
};

const { getFlag } = useOnShowFlag();

const { queryData, queryState } = useProductListOfSubscription();

// 监听onshow - 跳转后回转
function onShowOfJumpBack() {

      window.console.log('onshow isBack', isBack);
    }
  });
}

/**

 * @param groupId groupId表示数据源分组的id

 */
const onSourceSelect = (groupId: string, value: string) => {
  const selectedDataSourceList = dataSourceConfigForDisplay || [];
  const index = selectedDataSourceList.findIndex(ele => ele.id === groupId);
  const source = dataSourceList.value.find(ele => ele.id === +value);
  if (index > -1 && source) {
    const list = source.protocolFormat.map(ele => {
      return {
        sourceFieldName: ele.varName,
        sourceFieldKey: `$_${source.id}_${ele.key}`,
        inputFieldName: ``,
        inputFieldKey: [],
        inputFieldValue: '',
        placeholder: `${ele.description}:${ele.value}`,
      };
    });
    const obj = {
      dataSourceId: String(source.id),
      dataSourceName: source.name,
      fieldMappings: list,
    };
    initialValue.value.data = obj;
    emits('input', cloneDeep(initialValue.value));
  }
};

/**
 * 级联数据变动
 * @param value
 * @param selectOption
 * @param option 配置，其中groupId表示数据源分组的id,fieldKey表示当前操作的是哪一个变量
 */
const onCacasderChange = (value, selectOption, option: { groupId: string; fieldKey: string }) => {
  const selectedDataSourceList = dataSourceConfigForDisplay || [];
  const index = selectedDataSourceList.findIndex(ele => ele.id === option.groupId);

);

);
